Changelog
=========

1.2 (2016-06-22)
----------------

- Performance improvements
- Intelligent caching of groups, plus cache invalidation on changes to
  a workspace
- Added a new role TeamGuest that can be used to grant reduced access
  permissions to a workspace


1.1 (2014-07-04)
----------------

- Fixed distribution issues


1.0 (2014-07-04)
----------------

- Initial release
